LanguageData.VCEUE_ExtractNeutroamineDesc: Extract 150 Neutroamine from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantRefineNeutroamine: Can't refine Neutroamine: Neutroamine Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_NeutroamineValveDesc: Switches Neutroamine flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VCEUE_ExtractFSXDesc: Extract 150 FSX from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantRefineFSX: Can't refine FSX: FSX Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_FSXValveDesc: Switches FSX flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VCEUE_ExtractPrometheumDesc: Extract 150 Prometheum from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantRefinePrometheum: Can't refine Prometheum: Prometheum Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_PrometheumValveDesc: Switches Prometheum flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VCEUE_ExtractDyeDesc: Extract 150 Dye from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantRefineDye: Can't refine Dye: Dye Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_DyeValveDesc: Switches Dye flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VCEUE_ExtractWastepackDesc: Extract 150 Wastepacks from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantRefineWastepack: Can't refine Wastepack: Wastepack Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_CantPumpWastepack: Can't pump Wastepack: Wastepack Tanks are full
LanguageData.VCEUE_WastepackValveDesc: Switches Wastepack flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
